text: He priya nabi! Amara tomara jan'ya tomara stridera baidha karechi yadera tumi tadera denamohara adaya karecha, ara yadera tomara dana hata dhare rekheche, tadera madhya theke yadera allah tomake yud'dhera danarupe diyechena, ara tomara cacara meyedera o tomara phuphura meyedera ebam tomara mamara meyedera o tomara masira meyedera -- yara tomara sange hijarata kareche, ara kono mumina nari yadi se nabira kache nijeke samarpana kare, yadi nabi'o take bibaha karate cana -- eti bisesa kare tomara jan'ya, muminaganake bada diye. Amara abasya'i jani tadera jan'ya amara ki bidhana diyechi tadera stridera sanbandhe ara tadera dana hata yadera dhare rekheche tadera sanbandhe, yena tomara upare badha na thake. Ara allah hacchena paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.
